titleStmt.title: Mephibosheths hearts-ioy vpon his soueraignes safetie To be imitated by the subjects of this land vpon the happy returne of our Prince Charles. Deliuered in a sermon in the church of Great Yarmouth in Norfolke, the 19. day of October. 1623. By Tho: Reeue preacher of Gods word there.
titleStmt.author: Reeve, Tho. (Thomas), 1583 or 4-1651.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Aug: Math[ewes]: for Robert Milbourne and are to be sold at his shop at the great south doore of Saint Paules,

notesStmt.note: Some print faded and show-through, and some pages stained.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary.

place.placeName: his shop at the great south doore of Saint Paules
